p:
The oxidant scavenging of hydrogen peroxide (H 2O 2) was used according to the method of ( Ruch et al., 1989). H 2O 2 solution (4 mM) was formulated in phosphate buffer (50 mM) with 7.4 pH. Put the mixture in plant concentrations to get their volume up to 4 ml followed by shaking and incubation (10 min). Absorbance of blank (phosphate buffer), test samples and standards were taken at 230 nm. Scavenging capacity was assessed by the formula:
Scavenging %
=
1 -
Sample absorbance
Control absorbance
× 100
